column4: Livecd helps u to install as well run the operation system with out installing u can just it in to cd room boot the system and u can try how it works for you wheter sound is good wheter the network is good i mean the internet check those first before u install
wubi is in beta, but it's actually less likely to lose data than the livecd install
and I've seen people who can't boot when using the LiveCD install.
